title: Alexius Comnenus Appearing before the Doge
text: This painting is the modello, or preparatory sketch, for a much larger wall painting in the Great Council Hall in the Ducal Palace in Venice.
description: Turkish history, 1204. The Latin conquest of Constantinople in 1204. Alexis Comenenus before Doge Dandalo at Zara in quest of aid against his uncle Alexis. Grisaille
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
